biotools.summary: pKNOT (Protein Knot) is a tool that can detect knots in proteins as well as providing information on knotted proteins in PDB. pKNOT-v2 has been updated with a homology modeling tool such that the server can now accept protein sequences in addition to 3D structures or PDB IDs and return knot analysis.

bioschemas.name: pKNOT-v2
bioschemas.summary: pKNOT (Protein Knot) is a tool that can detect knots in proteins as well as providing information on knotted proteins in PDB. pKNOT-v2 has been updated with a homology modeling tool such that the server can now accept protein sequences in addition to 3D structures or PDB IDs and return knot analysis.
